testsuite.name: com.kanastra.miniredis.infrastructure.handler.ClientManagerTest

testcase.name: stop does not shutdown pool if already shutdown()
handleClient closes socket when not running()
stop sets running to false and shuts down the thread pool()
handleClient submits ClientProcessor to the thread pool when running()
start sets running to true and logs info()

testsuite.system-err: Apr 04, 2025 10:31:25 AM com.kanastra.miniredis.infrastructure.handler.ClientManager start INFO: Client Manager started Apr 04, 2025 10:31:25 AM com.kanastra.miniredis.infrastructure.handler.ClientManager stop INFO: Client Manager stopped Apr 04, 2025 10:31:25 AM com.kanastra.miniredis.infrastructure.handler.ClientManager handleClient INFO: Client Manager is not running, cannot handle client. Apr 04, 2025 10:31:25 AM com.kanastra.miniredis.infrastructure.handler.ClientManager start INFO: Client Manager started Apr 04, 2025 10:31:25 AM com.kanastra.miniredis.infrastructure.handler.ClientManager stop INFO: Client Manager stopped Apr 04, 2025 10:31:25 AM com.kanastra.miniredis.infrastructure.handler.ClientManager start INFO: Client Manager started Apr 04, 2025 10:31:25 AM com.kanastra.miniredis.infrastructure.handler.ClientManager start INFO: Client Manager started
